alert.note: Alert for Moody (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 09 at 7:53AM MDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed to Minor severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in South Dakota... Split Rock Creek near Corson affecting Minnehaha County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Iowa... Rock River at Rock Rapids affecting Lyon County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota...South Dakota... Flandreau Creek near Flandreau affecting Pipestone and Moody Counties. Sixmile Creek near Brookings affecting Brookings County. .Snow melt and increased reservoir releases will cause the river flows to become high. Expect minor flooding downstream from the dam. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Flandreau Creek near Flandreau. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, significant amounts of pasture land begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 9.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:45 AM CDT Sunday was 9.2 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (unknown time) Location Stg Stg Day/Time d1 d2 d3 Flandreau Creek Flandreau 9.0 9.2 Sun 7 am MSG MSG MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 1100 AM CDT.
